About Us

The New Gym is the lowest cost 24/7 gym chain with multiple locations nationwide. Our mission is to break down barriers to health for everyone in Vietnam, providing a gym system with high quality, affordable and flexible exercise equipment for all. The New Gym – GYM FOR EVERYONE.

We want to make sure that all members feel completely welcome at The New Gym. Whether it’s your first time at the gym and you’re in the early stages of your wellness journey, or you’re a professional athlete and working on your personal best.

All gyms of The New Gym are equipped with high-class equipment, free parking, in addition, members are also free to participate in group classes classes for free. Besides, if you want to achieve your health and fitness goals, an exercise program tailored to your fitness is the fastest and most effective way to reach your goals. The New Gym team of personal trainers will accompany you throughout your training, advising on exercises, eating, and giving advice and guidance to members.

The New Gym, offers a flexible membership package, paying monthly – cheap – no contract. No contract means you can freeze or cancel your bundle whenever it suits you and rejoin when you’re ready. So instead of being tied to a year-long deal and opening hours that don’t suit your lifestyle, The New Gym offers you a personalized, professional fitness gym service that’s open to you. 24/7 door.

At The New Gym you have many options to work out in the gym. But we also believe that you can be fit anywhere you want. Loving what you do, when you want it, and where you want it to be is key to achieving your goals. Whether you want to work out at the club, at home or outside, it’s up to you.

We are here to help you. And The New Gym app makes it easier and more fun! The application helps you to book a workout schedule, buy a training package, reserve, schedule a workout with a personal trainer, etc., making training easier and more enjoyable than ever. Download The New Gym app now!

Become a member of The New Gym. Choose the membership that suits you best and add additional members to fit your needs 100%. In some areas we also offer custom clubs and our club is open 24/7.

Join now and start training with The New Gym!
